item.title: Introduction to FOSS and Fedora Project

item.content:
Introduction to Free and Open Source Software and Fedora Project

Originally presented at Fedora 31 Release Party Karachi on 15th Feb 2020 in Karachi, Pakistan

Key points

  • What is FOSS, Free and Open Source Software
  • Perks of contributing to a FOSS
  • What is Fedora Project
    • Four Foundations
  • Where to contribute
  • How to start contributing

Slides

Google Slides
